effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks the target with great
power. However, it also lowers the
user’s Attack and Defense.
